content.question: A golfer recorded the following scores for each of four rounds of golf: 86, 81, 87, 82. The mean of the scores is 84. What is the sum of the squared deviations of the scores from the mean?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum of, open parenthesis, x minus the sample mean, close parenthesis, equals, open parenthesis, 86 minus 84, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, 81 minus 84, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, 87 minus 84, close parenthesis, plus, open parenthesis, 82 minus 84, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>86</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>81</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>87</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>82</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the sum of the absolute value of x minus the sample mean, end absolute value, equals the absolute value of 86 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 81 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 87 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 82 minus 84, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>86</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>81</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>87</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>82</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the sum of the absolute value of, x minus the sample mean, end absolute value, equals, 2 times, open bracket, the absolute value of 86 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 81 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 87 minus 84, end absolute value, plus the absolute value of 82 minus 84, end absolute value, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>86</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>81</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>87</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>82</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the sum of, open parenthesis, x minus the sample mean, close parenthesis, squared, equals open parenthesis, 86 minus 84, close parenthesis, squared, plus open parenthesis, 81 minus 84, close parenthesis, squared, plus open parenthesis 87 minus 84, close parenthesis, squared, plus open parenthesis, 82 minus 84, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>∑</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>86</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>81</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>87</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>82</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open bracket, the sum of, the absolute value of x minus the sample mean, end absolute value, close bracket, squared, equals, open bracket, the absolute value of 86 minus 84, end absolute value, plus, the absolute value of 81 minus 84, end absolute value, plus, the absolute value of 87 minus 84, end absolute value, plus, the absolute value of 82 minus 84, end absolute value, close bracket, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>86</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>81</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>87</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>82</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>84</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
